channel.title: What Da Hex!
channel.description: Recent content on What Da Hex!

item.title: About
item.description: Hi, I am Faiz Ilahi Kothari. I currently work at Cisco Systems India. This blog is kind of a weblog of my learnings and is a collection of random musings. Don't expect it to help you conquer Earth or clean your laundry. You are free to use the whole or part of the content in whichever way you want, though I am not responsible if that burns your hair or kills your cat (Yes, it's suppose to sound cool :stuck_out_tongue_winking_eye: ).
